meanings.definition: A sheet of paper containing clipped articles or images.
meanings.sent1: I keep all my favorite articles in a clipsheets for easy reference.
meanings.sent2: She handed me a clipsheets filled with recipes she wanted to try.
meanings.sent3: The clipsheets of funny cat pictures always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her clipsheets of travel destinations was a window to the world.
meanings.sent5: The clipsheets of inspirational quotes motivated me every day.

meanings.definition: To fasten or attach with a clip.
meanings.sent1: I need to clipsheets the papers together before handing them in.
meanings.sent2: She clipsheets her hair back while working to keep it out of her face.
meanings.sent3: He tried to clipsheets the broken vase back together, but it never looked the same.
meanings.sent4: The teacher clipsheets the student's artwork on the bulletin board for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The chef clipsheets the recipe cards to the cabinet for easy access.

meanings.definition: The act of clipping or cutting.
meanings.sent1: Her quick clipsheets of the fabric impressed everyone in the sewing class.
meanings.sent2: The barber's precise clipsheets gave his clients the perfect haircut.
meanings.sent3: The clipsheets of the hedge made it look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent4: The clipsheets of the coupons saved her a lot of money at the store.
meanings.sent5: The clipsheets of the ribbon added a decorative touch to the gift.
